column4: Tesla wins court case against Ontario government over rebate cancellation
column5: TORONTO A Canadian court has ruled in favor of Tesla Inc after the electric carmaker challenged the province of Ontario's wind-down of an electric vehicle rebate.

column4: RPT-EXPLAINER-Tesla's U-turn puts it back at square one on cash
column5: NEW YORK  Aug 28 Elon Musk's take-private plans for Tesla Inc have evaporated  but the company's looming debt needs remain.
